content: पांचाल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (ली|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) Belonging to or ruling over the Pañcālas. --लः {@--1@} The country of the Pañcālas. {@--2@} A prince of the Pañcālas --लाः ({%<ab>m.</ab>%} <ab>pl.</ab>) {@--1@} The people of the Pañcālas. {@--2@} An association of five guilds ({%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} of a car penter, weaver, barber, washerman, and shoe-maker).

पांचाली {@--1@} A woman or princess of the Pañcālas. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of Draupadī, the wife of the Pāṇḍavas. {@--3@} A doll, puppet. {@--4@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) One of the four styles of composition. The <ls>S. D.</ls>thus defines it:-- वर्णैः शेषैः ({%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} माधुर्यव्यंजकौजःप्रकांशकाभ्यां भिन्नैः) पुनर्द्वयोः समस्तपंचषपदो बंधः पांचालिको मतः .. <ls n="S. D.">628.</ls>
